title: I Often Question Government Employees
body:
http://www.msn.com/en-us/news/us/ice-nabs-teenager-hours-before-his-senior-prom-days-before-his-graduation-ceremony/ar-BBCF2Lk?li=BBnb7Kz&ocid=spartandhp

I take it ICE needed numbers so they decided to just pick up whoever they can. No different than police with traffic tickets.
